JobFullDesc: About the RoleThe Uber Technical Writing team plays a critical role in increasing internal engineering productivity and innovation.As a Senior Technical Writer, you will use your writing expertise, technical skills, and learner’s attitude to make it easy for Uber engineers to understand and use the cutting edge tech stack that powers over 16 million Uber trips daily. You will partner with engineers, technical writers, program managers, and data scientists to identify the most pressing pain points and help engineering writing partners build most important internal technical documentation. Dedicated to excellence, you will experiment and creatively find ways to help engineers learn about technologies like API gateways, configuration systems, and machine learning, which will help scale the way we deliver best-in-class engineering globally. What the Candidate Will Do:Work closely with engineers to produce high-quality technical documentation that engineers trustImprove existing onboarding processes with documentation, helping engineers get up to speed quicklyTake initiative to improve the developer experience by testing tools and services, investigating problems, and channeling feedback into high-quality, impactful documentationAccurately prioritize documentation, from the layout of content on a page to finding its accurate place in the entire documentation taxonomy, with search optimization in mindDefine standards and guidelines that help other writers and engineersInfluence and motivate partners to adopt your documentation visionBasic QualificationsA minimum of 4 years of experience writing and organizing developer-facing documentation and other forms of technical contentProven ability to quickly learn about technical concepts and write accurate, concise contentExperience writing for the web, software, hardware, or cloud technologiesProven ability to independently propose, plan, and deliver documentation solutions to developer problemsPreferred QualificationsExperience mentoring writers or engineers to improve their writing skillsExperience writing about large-scale web services, data platforms, or developer ecosystems (knowledge of the various pieces of interacting technologies behind platforms)Experience crafting API documentation or code examplesExperience with Confluence and statically generated HTML/CSS/JS contentAbout the Company At Uber, we ignite opportunity by setting the world in motion. We take on big problems to help drivers, riders, delivery partners, and eaters get moving in more than 10,000 cities around the world.We welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently. If you have the curiosity, passion, and collaborative spirit, work with us, and let’s move the world forward, together.Uber is proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer.
